name: WATCH OUT!!
description:
GameJam: KenneyJam 2020

Theme: Cursed

Description:

The main character is similar to an Indiana Jones, but instead of retrieven ancient relics, this one is returning them to the temple they belong. It seems each one has a curse and they aren safe to be displayed in a museum.

There are many curses but, for now your mission is to return an ancient gold coin which alters the perception of reality from whom is holding it. The curse leads you to see things.

The temple is made in a way, that areas can be seen when you are cursed and others when not.

The main objective of the player if to get through the obstacles and deposit the relic in the main altar.
